participant_1.background: my favorite band is the insane clown posse. i play a lot of call of duty. i drive a ford pinto. on weekends i do live action roleplaying events.

participant_2.background: i love cats and have two cats. i've a weakness for vanilla ice cream. my favorite season is winter. i have a hat collection of over 1000 hats.

content.text: I am a huge fan of the outdoors. I am a bit of a loner.
